member.name: T:Bridge.Car
member.summary: This the the Car sub class that inherits from the vehicle base class

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.Price
member.summary: Calculates the price for the Car to cross the bridge The base price for a Car is 230kr If the Car has a Brobizz discount, a 10% discount is added to base price

member.name: T:Bridge.MC
member.summary: This the the MC sub class that inherits from the vehicle base class

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.Price
member.summary: Calculates the price for the MC to cross the bridge The base price for a MC is 120kr If the MC has a Brobizz discount, a 10% discount is added to base price

member.name: T:Bridge.Vehicle
member.summary: Represents a vechicle object with stored licence plates and date data

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a vehicle with attributes
member.exception: Thrown if the license plate is longer than 7 characters

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Calculates the price for crossing the bridge

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Gets the type of the vehicle
